# Slashing Dispel (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]/[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Duskblade Spells|Duskblade 5]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target or Area:** One creature or 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 125

*You rip away the spell energy infused within a creature, turning it into a harmful burst of energy that burns into the creature before dissipating.*

This spell functions like *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, except as noted here. Any creature that has a spell effect removed from it takes 2 points of damage per level of the dispelled effect. If a creature loses the effects of multiple spells, it takes damage for each one.
